## Import data
```{r import, echo=T}
raw <- read.table("data/sites.csv", header=T, sep=";", dec=",", na.strings="?")
```

## Fix coordinates
```{r}

gsub(",", ".", gsub("ยบ|\\*|\\*\\*|\\", " ", raw$lat))
```
